title: Half-naked lovesick German teen scales prison wall to get to his ex-girlfriend's barred cell window
text:
A lovesick German teenager scaled a prison wall while half-naked to reach his ex-girlfriend's cell window in a Shakespearean attempt to win her back.

With a nod to the balcony scene from Romeo and Juliet, the 18-year-old clambered up the 13ft wall to try to reach his ex-girlfriend.

The heartbroken teenager, who could face prosecution for trespassing, refused to come down and was eventually removed by the fire brigade.

A lovesick German teenager has scaled a prison wall while half-naked to reach his ex-girlfriend's cell window in a Shakespearean attempt to win her back. Pictured is the youth prison in Lower Saxony

He said he was half-naked because he wanted to avoid tearing his clothes on barbed wire as he climbed up to the first-floor window.

Local media reported that his ex-girlfriend, who is also 18, had broken up with him just before his romantic but misguided attempt to persuade her back into his arms.

A spokesman for the youth prison in Vechta in Lower Saxony said the teen was desperate for his ex to take him back.

The heartbroken teenager, who could face prosecution for trespassing, refused to come down and was eventually removed by the fire brigade

He managed to scale a street lamp to get over the wall so authorities have now wrapped it in barbed wire to stop any future attempts of a break-in.

As he was being removed, the teenager suffered a minor injury, according to DPA news agency.

No further details have been released about the teenager and his young offender ex-girlfriend - or if his efforts to win her back were successful.

Romeo, Shakespeare's passionate romantic hero, scales a garden wall in Romeo and Juliet.
description: The teenager, 18, refused to come down and had to be removed by the fire brigade. He scaled a street lamp to get over the 13-foot wall of the Lower Saxony youth prison after removing his clothes.
